text: Mme Jesu a dumela gore Elija o tshwanetse go tla pele go baakanya tsela, le fa go ntse jalo go setse go diragetse, o setse a tsile! Le gore o kopane le matshwenyego a a boitshegang, fela jaaka Baporofiti ba ne ba boletse. Hong Jesu a ba botsa gore baporofiti ba ka ne ba ne ba raya eng fa ba re, Mesia o tlaa boga a ba a tsewa ka lonyatso.
